tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_medication_usage (
  patient_id INT,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50),
  dosage INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  effectiveness_score INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY, patient_name VARCHAR(50), date_of_birth DATE)\nCREATE TABLE medications (medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY, medication_name VARCHAR(50), dosage INT, patient_id INT, FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id))

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    PRIMARY KEY (patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE treatments (
    treatment_id INT NOT NULL,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    medication_id INT NOT NULL,
    effectiveness_score INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (medication_id) REFERENCES medications(medication_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (treatment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE Medications (
  medication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  frequency VARCHAR(20),
  side_effects TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Treatments (
  treatment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  treatment_name VARCHAR(50),
  cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE UsageTracking (
  usage_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  dosage_taken VARCHAR(20),
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE EffectivenessTracking (
  effectiveness_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication_id INT,
  effectiveness_score INT,
  feedback TEXT
);
